column3: Additional HR resources are required for:  - Legal drafting and approval of amendments of secondary legislation setting out detailed implementing rules on auctioning; Union Registry; monitoring and reporting; verification of reports; - Implementation tasks related to the land sector extension to include agriculture non-CO2 emissions;  - Monitoring the upgraded and enhanced implementation of monitoring, reporting and verification (MRV) obligations  - IT adaptations in the Union Registry (together with ETS)
